long_description: Waterproof, tough and stylish, the Ortlieb Barista Handlebar Bag totes your everday items to and fro with urban-savvy chic. Magnetic top flap closes securely, and leather trim adds a touch of style. Includes lockable mounting bracket with 2 keys. Ortlieb Barista Handlebar Bag is also compatable with KLICKfix system by Rixen and Kaul. Internal organizer; shoulder strap; leather trim.
short_description: Waterproof, tough and stylish, the Ortlieb Barista Handlebar Bag totes your everday items to and fro with urban-savvy chic.
